name: Batteri Fjell 1945
description:
Batteri Fjell 1945 is a history-driven game set in an accurately reconstructed Fjell Fortress outside Bergen as it appeared when World War II ended in 1945. Here, you will experience a world in chaos and uncertainty. Through your own choices, you will encounter different characters – such as a resistance fighter with needs for revenge and justice, a local resident who has found great love, a German prisoner of war, an Allied soldier trying to navigate the fragile situation, and more.

Through the journalist role in the game, you will explore the fortress during this tense time. This unique game aims to engage both students and others in history and help them truly understand the extraordinary circumstances that unfolded in the country, where traditional roles were turned upside down, and thoughts of revenge prevailed.
